description:
Nami`s heartbreaking past - and Luffy`s epic battle with Arlong - are recalled in this flashback to the early days of the Straw Hats!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Bond of Friendship Woven by Tears! Nami`s World Map
Les larmes tissent les liens des compagnons ! La carte du monde de Nami
Namida ga Tsumuida Nakama no Kizuna! Nami no Sekai Chizu
Слёзы, объединившие накама! Карта мира Нами
涙が紡いだ仲間の絆! ナミの世界地図
